title: SysLinuxOS, A Linux Distro for System Administrators
author: David Cassel
description: SysLinuxOS promises to "put an end to searching for the right tools for admin tasks" by offering a "very extensive selection of software, especially for using the internet."
cntitle: SysLinuxOS，专为系统管理员设计的 Linux 发行版
cndescription: SysLinuxOS 承诺“结束为管理任务寻找正确工具”的局面，提供“非常广泛的软件选择，特别是用于使用互联网”。
